New Records: Mustafizur needs four wickets to get to 100 T20I wickets, while Shadab is five away from the same milestone.
Key Match Events: Pakistan won by 5 wickets (with 11 balls remaining)
Pre-Game Insights: Bangladesh might be still smarting from their five-run defeat to India, which was followed by fake-fielding accusations against Virat Kohli.
Pakistan will be aware of these gaps in Bangladesh's make-up.
For Pakistan, there are worries, especially because of the low returns from Babar Azam and Mohammad Rizwan:
Miscellaneous Highlights: Three out of four matches at the Adelaide Oval have been won by the side defending a total, with the average score batting first in those matches being 179.
A full game is in the offing as no rain has been forecast for Sunday.
Others: Shadab Khan's maiden T20I fifty couldn't have come at a more opportune time for Pakistan.
Nurul Hasan has made only 41 runs in four innings despite coming out to bat with 9 and 9.4 overs remaining in two of those.
